src/lib/components/ITable.react.js.description: ITable is a dash component for ITables

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

data.description: The table data - a list of lists with the same length as the columns.

columns.description: The table columns - a list of dicts with a 'title' key.

selected_rows.description: The index of the selected rows (pass select=True to allow selection)

dt_args.description: The arguments for DataTable e.g. select, buttons, layout etc.

filtered_row_count.description: How many lines of the tables are not shown due to downsampling

downsampling_warning.description: The downsampling warning message, if any

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.
